title: Hextech crashed and I lost my key
body: I crafted a key and my client crashed when I attempted to open a chest, I relogged into client and key was gone, with no chest opened.

replies.body:
Are you using any third party apps like play.tv?  They've been known to cause crashes in areas like champ select and hextech crafting and might be worth removing if so.  Fortunately, even though the animation might crash it will still reach our servers.  I do see that 3 fragments were crafted for a key, and then used to open a mastery chest.  It looks like your chest rewarded the following:

150 Orange Essence
1 Battlecast Icon

I hope that helps clear things up, and congrats!
I do have plays.tv, I may remove it. Thank you for the help!
